q1: Chelsea is not a good team
a1: For a not good team they have an impressive track record.
q2: You are biased since you are a fan, aren't you?
a2: I don't understand why you think Chelsea is bad.  They have a great track record.  And actually, I'm a Liverpool fan.
q3: How many championships have they won?
a4: N'golo Kante is the best player...
q5: Who will be top scorer this season?
a5: I think Eden Hazard will be the top scorer.
